name: Revitalize Healing
tooltip:
[<d ref="duckiesHeroUpgrader_HealAmountLVLDummy.amount" style="Bold"/>/<d ref="5" style="Bold"/>] 

Increase Revitalize healing to primary target by <d ref="duckiesHeroUpgrader_HealAmountUpgrade.set_values[0].target_value" style="Bold"/> and healing to adjacent allies by <d ref="duckiesHeroUpgrader_HealAmountUpgrade.set_values[1].target_value" style="Bold"/>.
